line.text: Point with one finger to control the cursor.
Strike the air over the Leap Motion Controller to play the drums.
You can strike the zones with open hands,
extended fingers, pencils, and chop sticks.
Select a drum icon to assign a drum to a pad.
Then select the desired pad to complete the assignment.
The transport controls are at the top of the screen.
Use them to control rewind, play, record, metronome, and tempo.
There is a list at the left and right edge of the screen.
Use these lists to select drum kits and patterns.
